note-payout-and-limit: Side bets cannot exceed half the amount of the main bet
payout-no-initial-bet: Payout does not include initial bet.

general.title: General
general.paragraph-1: To participate in the game, you must have sufficient balance/funds to cover your bets. Your current balance can be seen at the bottom left of your screen.
general.paragraph-2: The TOTAL BET indicator displays the total amount of bets you have placed for the current round.
general.paragraph-3: The table displays the minimum and maximum bets allowed, which may change at any time. Additionally, a unique period code and the name of the game you are playing are shown.
general.paragraph-4: The timer informs you of the remaining time to place your bet. Once it expires, betting is closed, and no further bets are accepted. After the betting time ends, you will receive a confirmation message stating "Bet Accepted" if your bet has been successfully placed. Otherwise, you will receive a message stating "Bet Rejected."
general.paragraph-5: The chip display allows you to select the value of each chip you want to bet. You can choose the chip value by clicking on the chips at the bottom of the screen near the Cancel, Double, and Rebet buttons to see all available chip values.

menu.title: Menu
menu.description: Additional buttons to enhance the player's experience.
menu.paragraph-1: Removes a previously placed chip from the table.
menu.paragraph-2: Doubles the amount of chips you have placed. Ensure you have sufficient balance to double all active bets.
menu.paragraph-3: Allows you to repeat the same bets from the previous round.
menu.paragraph-4: Provides access to important game options.
menu.paragraph-5: Conceals the chips already placed on the table.
menu.paragraph-7: Displays or hides game statistics and roadmaps.
menu.paragraph-8: Stores and retrieves favorite bet patterns.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Additional options to customize features based on user needs and preferences.

video.title: video
video.description: Description : Configures whether to enable live streaming and adjust streaming resolution.

live-streaming-audio.title: Live Streaming Audio
live-streaming-audio.description: Description : Controls the audio settings for live streaming.

background-music.title: Background Music
background-music.description: Description : Controls the background music settings.

game-effects.title: Game Effects
game-effects.description: Description : Controls the sound effects settings for the game.

auto-bet.title: Auto Bet
auto-bet.description: Description : Controls the automatic betting automatic betting based on the previous wager.

language.title: Language
language.description: Description : Controls the language settings for the game.
language.default: Default : Matches the last selected language.

settings.disclaimer-settings: Your preference settings will be saved, except for the Auto Bet setting, which will reset to default.
